name: opdilib

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
OpDiLib (Open Multiprocessing Differentiation Library) is a universal
add-on for reverse mode operator overloading AD tools that enables the
differentiation of OpenMP parallel code.

dependent_to.name: su2
dependent_to.description:
SU2 is a suite of open-source software tools written in C++ for the
numerical solution of partial differential equations (PDE) and
performing PDE constrained optimization.
